title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 October 2013 - XWiki
content:
<UCC> has quit  
00:13 <evalica> has quit  
00:59 <Slashman> has quit

08:54 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki

09:12 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:47 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <vmassol> I'm not null!!!  
10:06 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:43 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <sburjan> has quit  
11:14 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
11:38 <msmeria> has quit  
12:18 <ldubost> has quit  
12:19 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
13:31 <mflorea> has quit  
13:35 <ldubost> has quit  
13:43 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
14:00 <ldubost> has quit  
14:08 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <sburjan> something broke the Test App, I think it was the migration to 5.2  
14:25 <sburjan> I don't know why this is failing  
14:30 <sburjan> vmassol: did you did something ?  
14:50 <ldubost> has quit  
15:00 <Slashman> hello, I removed the extension "User Directory Application" on xwiki 5.2 and it removed more than intended, is there a way to re-install it ?  
15:01 <Slashman> I don't see it in extension  
15:01 <ldubost> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <vmassol> sburjan: talk to manuel, we discussed this yesterday and we were waiting for you  
15:02 <sburjan> :) I was already off  
15:02 <tmortagne> Slashman: in "Add extensions" you can choose to search in "local" extension, if you use to have it you will find it here  
15:02 <vmassol> I see that the home page is empty now, it was ok yesterday, but I see you've made several changes too  
15:03 <sburjan> vmassol: I was able to reproduce locally on a 5.2. Alsio, on a 5.1 works. so something changed in XWIki, not in my code  
15:03 <tmortagne> Slashman: (when an extension is uninstalled it's kept in local extensions)  
15:03 <vmassol> sburjan: check the irc logs, I asked questions  
15:03 <sburjan> I am debugging locally  
15:03 <vmassol> the only issue there was yesterday was the product column  
15:03 <sburjan> yes, that's the one I am debugging  
15:03 <vmassol> and by looking at the code I don't see how it could have worked  
15:04 <vmassol> the JSON returned was of the format:  
15:04 <vmassol> [something]  
15:04 <vmassol> and the LT was set to consider it as HTML  
15:04 <Slashman> tmortagne: ok I installed it back but I was looking for the capability of changing my own password and it's still gone :'(  
15:04 <Slashman> the "preference" page is empty  
15:04 <sburjan> well it worked, you can check the screenshots form the extensions page. Those were live screenshots. It was working. Something changed  
15:04 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:05 <tmortagne> Slashman: I think your issue is not with that extension  
15:05 <tmortagne> hen you uninstall an extension its backward dependencies are removed too  
15:05 <tmortagne> which mean XE UI and maybe some others  
15:05 <Slashman> tmortagne: ok seems like I found it  
15:05 <Slashman> " User Profile Application"  
15:06 <gdelhumeau> Hi. About the new wiki API. Do you think the wiki manager that does CRUD operations can also manage operations related to descriptors (getById, getAll, exists, etc...) or should we have a seperate WikiDescriptorManager?  
15:06 <Slashman> tmortagne: ok the issue is that "User Profile Application" is linked to "XWiki Platform - Activity Stream - UI" and I don't want the later  
15:06 <tmortagne> sounds like what you are searching for yes, I guess it depends on the user directory extension  
15:06 <Slashman> tmortagne: is there a way to have "  
15:07 <Slashman> tmortagne: is there a way to have "User Profile Application" and not "XWiki Platform - Activity Stream - UI" ?  
15:07 <tmortagne> I know a hack but without a hack no way  
15:08 <tmortagne> you should create an issue on jira explaining that you don't find really nice you have User Profile Application depends on Wiki Platform - Activity Stream - UI  
15:08 <sburjan> vmassol: I have rolledback to your modifications, and moving to debug locally.  
15:09 <tmortagne> Slashman: in the meantime what you can do is let XWiki install XWiki Platform - Activity Stream - UI but remove its pages  
15:09 <tmortagne> but I can't assure you that user profile will work well if you do that  
15:09 <tmortagne> the thing is there is an activity stream in the users profiles  
15:10 <tmortagne> so that's why it depends on it  
15:10 <tmortagne> but I agree with you it's not very nice to have that hard dependency  
15:10 <Slashman> tmortagne: ok, good to know  
15:11 <Slashman> tmortagne: thx for the help :)  
15:11 <vmassol> sburjan: I only modified the webhome page to remove HTML  
15:12 <vmassol> (in the livetable field for product)  
15:12 <vmassol> and that didn't help obviously since the JSON is generating wrong content  
15:12 <tmortagne> Slashman: you'r welcome  
15:12 <sburjan> vmassol: well in my custom livetable results I am generating HTML content for that column. This is why It had set html:view  
15:15 <vmassol> [xxx] is not HTML  
15:15 <vmassol> you need to find out why it's generating that  
15:15 <vmassol> I don't know what you were generating before  
15:18 <sburjan> yes, debugging  
16:14 <evalica> has quit  
16:15 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
16:16 <sburjan> vmassol: fixed :)  
16:25 <vmassol> sburjan: what was wrong?  
16:29 <sburjan> vmassol: I was calling $xwiki.getDocument(ArrayList). It was my mistake. But for some reason, it was working well on 5.1 :)  
16:29 <vmassol> ok cool  
16:29 <sburjan> an ArrayList with only one element  
16:31 <Denis> has quit  
16:42 <vmassol> guys for escaping quotes in velocity, isn't the solution to use 2 double quotes as in "" ?  
16:43 <cjd> $escapetool.q iirc  
16:44 <mflorea> vmassol: yes, you can use double "  
16:50 <tmortagne> vmassol: btw the move all script services out of internal is going to break all of them in the SRD if when we add the 5.3 version  
16:50 <tmortagne> s/all/of/  
16:50 <vmassol> yes  
16:51 <vmassol> mflorea/cjd: ok thanks, I must have some other problems elsewhere then
